content:
When did we move of Travis CI? Is https://twitter.com/peter_szilagyi/status/1437646118700175360 relevant to us?

Between the 3 Sept and 10 Sept, secure env vars of *all* public @travisci repositories were injected into PR builds. Signing keys, access creds, API tokens. Anyone could exfiltrate these and gain lateral movement into 1000s of orgs. #security 1/4 https://travis-ci.community/t/security-bulletin/12081

- Péter Szilágyi (karalabe.eth) (@peter_szilagyi)
Miss read the tweet. It happened in the past 2 weeks. No impact on Rust. Sorry for the noise.
yeah, this doesn't affect us, but... wow
more at travis's comms rather than the bug
